mapper.select: SELECT r.state as stateRef,r.name as name,rr.deleteable as deleteable, rr.editable as editable, rr.requestable as requestable,rr.applyable as applyable, rr.upable as upable,rr.downable as downable, rr.cancelable as cancelable,rr.releaseable,rr.copyable FROM ug_resource r,ug_role_resource rr where r.id = rr.resource and rr.role = #{rid}
SELECT u.id as id,u.name as name,u.state as state, u.url as url,u.description as description FROM ug_resource u
